verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> followed hard <S%H1692>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and upon his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H4444>Malchi-shua,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> went <S%H3513>sore<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H4672>hit<s%> him; and he was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H2342>wounded<s%> of the <S%H4480>archers.<s%> <S%H3384><s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> unto his <S%H5375>armorbearer,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H8025>Draw<s%> thy <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and thrust me <S%H1856>through<s%> therewith; <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> and thrust me <S%H1856>through,<s%> and <S%H5953>abuse<s%> me. But his <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it.

And when his <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H5375>armorbearer,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H376>men,<s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

And when the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and they <S%H834>that<s%> were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2004>them.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And they cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and stripped <S%H6584>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> to <S%H1319>publish<s%> it in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H6091>idols,<s%> and <S%H854>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And they <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6252>Ashtaroth:<s%> and they <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1472>body<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1052>Beth-shan.<s%>

And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H853><s%> of that <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul;<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1472>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H1472>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from the <S%H4480>wall<s%> <S%H2346><s%> of <S%H1052>Beth-shan,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> them <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> them <S%H8478>under<s%> a <S%H815>tree<s%> at <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
